inclusion.criterion: joint information meeting for women booked for planned CD
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Antibiotic therapy during the last week before caesarean section
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs, including with Pseudomonas and Enterococcus. They also have a non-hodgkins Marginal Zone Lymphoma of the left orbit and SLE with transverse myelitis.
